transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Hanji good morning sir hanji.
Executive: Good morning ji ji main abhi baat kar raha hun India Mart head office se apne account me register kaise hai aap sab.
Customer: Hanji bolo.
Executive: Ji sir maine na basically aapko call kiya tha jo mam ne excel sheet bheji thi na mere november data mile the usme.
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Usme jo inquiry ko sara mam ne data bheja hua hai sir theek hai.
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Ha to usi ke bare me maine call kiya tha aap ek bar wo data open kar payenge ek bar aap excel sheet group me bheji hui hai already.
Customer: Aap group me ho mam pass hai mere batao.
Executive: Ha maine open kar liya hai maine open kar liya hai sir jaise mano sir isme jo inquiry aayi hai direct right sir.
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Ha dekho direct inquiry sir wo to hamara bhi judgement nahi hota kyuki wo to buyer khud hi khud hi call kar raha hai khud hi message kar raha hai sir hai na usme chahiye na chahiye wo ek alag matter hai usko to hum log verify nahi kar payenge sir like jo aapki by list hai jaise mano aapki ek by list hai aapko batata hu ek bar excel sheet pe agar aap aayenge row number by list row number hai sir 20 ek bar ye dekho sir ek bar theek hai export teaser ki requirement aayi thi aur buyer ka naam to nahi likha hai S by lead karke likha hua hai sir right.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai ye buyer ka naam nahi tha na sir S by lead.
Customer: Hmm bolo puri baat bolo aap.
Executive: Ha ab jaise ye jo by list hai jaise buyer ka name to nahi likha hua hai ab is by list se agar aapne ye likha hai ki not required right to ispe mam ne call kiya hoga tha is type ki sir jo leads hai ye leads hum log verify karwa denge team se ki buyer not required bol raha hai jab is number pe call kiya gaya to banda bola ki galti se hua hai hame nahi chahiye kuch bhi.
Customer: Ha ha iska matlab ye wali not required.
Executive: Right.
Customer: Hmm to ye wali jo hai na is type ki jo by list hai sir ye hum log ek bar verify karwa denge sir aapki theek hai aur jo indirect inquiry hai like unhone aapko khud hi message kiya hai sir ya matlab jis buyer jo buyer ki aapki call picking nahi hui hai sir call picking to uska mujhe ye batao aap ye you want to say that ki aapko inquiry se koi lena dena nahi hai by lead aap verify karaoge seedha bolo na kyu gol gol ghuma rahe ho aap.
Executive: Right right right verify hum log verify karwa denge sir theek hai isliye sir maine call karao aur jo main cheez mudda hai export wala uske tum log baat hi nahi kar rahe ho bhai.
Executive: Export ka isme abhi ye domestic ka aapne isme sir ne call kiya tha to export already chala gaya tha.
Customer: Main daily roz main 10 bar bolta hun ki aap export ka kya kar rahe ho hame koi response nahi hai na hame continue karna hai actually export ka koi bhi lead mat uthana aaj ke baad theek hai chhod do jab koi matlab hi nahi hai to kyu uthana hum aaj ke baad se na export pe koi lead baat karenge na hum export purchase karenge theek hai.
Executive: To uska kya karna hai hame bata dena.
Customer: Export ka sir main aapko ye bolu usko aap continue kam ko thoda long follow chalte hai export ka purchase kar dete hai to aapke record me hi aana na dekho aapne uthaya hai.
Executive: Ha theek hai na export ka hamare export se koi response nahi hai to aaj ke baad se hamare export ke koi lead nahi hum kam karenge na hum purchase karenge.
Customer: Aisa nahi hai sir ki export se response nahi hai buyer buyer ko sir kya hame pata hai ki aapko pata hai.
Executive: Nahi aap kar rahe ho aapko response agar aapko pata hai to koi hame baat kara ke dikha do check karke dikha do aap call call se baat nahi karte sir unko sir mail hi karna padta hai mail karna padta hai message karna padta hai sir.
Customer: Jab kiya hua hai na.
Executive: Ha to mail ya message pe hi revert karte hai sir.
Customer: Sir hum mail hi karte hai hum mail pe hi hota hai export ka theek hai na ha to hame continue nahi karna us pe koi ek saal ke andar koi bhi response nahi hai ek bhi deal nahi hui hai export ki.
Executive: Nahi buyer ke reply to aaya hoga aise wale se koi bhi buyer ke reply nahi hoga sir.
Customer: Nothing nothing aaya.
Executive: Aata to hum aapko batate nahi isse aaya hai hame kya jarurat hai hame kam milta to hum aapko kyu bolenge ki kam nahi aaya.
Customer: To sare record me hai wo sare record me hai agar mail bhi aaya hai to email id ka password deta hun aap email id hamara check kar lo ki kya baat ho rahi hai kiska response aaya aur batao.
Executive: Matlab ek ek karne par kisi buyer ne reply bhi nahi kiya hum logo ko.
Customer: Nahi aaya nahi aaya.
Executive: Nahi karna no response.
Customer: Shit.
Executive: Chalo fir aapko wo bhi dikha deta hu aap khud hi batao aap ek lakh ek lakh de rahe ho export ke liye aapko isme ek saal me response na aaye to kaisa feel karoge aap.
Customer: Exactly agree sir.
Executive: Samajh gaye.
Customer: Now main samajh gaya sir deal convert hone ke alag matter ho gaya actually to export ke upar pehle baat karo baki ye cheeze baad me hum karenge ek cheez clear kara do aap.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai sir main dono discuss kar raha ek bar aapke sath theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai ji okay okay theek hai sir main karta hu call back.
summary:
Concerns:

- No response from export leads in one year.

- Wants to discuss export-related issues first.

- Expresses frustration with indirect inquiries.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to verify by leads.

- Executive agreed to discuss export issues.

- Executive will call back to discuss further.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back to discuss further.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- export, buyleads, verification, response
